title: Civil War II #1
description: See behind the battlefield with this digital exclusive edition clocking in over 200 pages including never-before-seen extras featuring the script by Brian Michael Bendis and a variant cover gallery, plus layouts, inked pages, and color pages by David Marquez and Justin Ponsor!This is the explosive first chapter in the comic event EVERYONE is talking about. A new Inhuman, with the ability to profile the future, emerges and the ramifications ripple into every corner of the Marvel Universe. Lines are drawn, bodies fall, and the Marvel Universe will be rocked to it's very core. The action starts here!
author: Brian Michael Bendis
